message: Things are starting to get pretty strange. Firstly, Kano and her sister. Feels like they know a lot more than they show for...Next is Misuzu love for dinosaurs. Didn't seem that off at first but when she explained her reasons... it started to make me worry (specifically about her fate). Lastly, Haruko. To me, she never really seemed like a mother type...Anything regarding Misuzu, she brushes off in a second...
Potato's thought process must have been like, "I can't waiting for him to call me out!"ðŸ˜‚
